title: Monologue Woven For You Vol. 1
description: Two women, one spotlight. Haruka has abandoned her dreams of the theatre but finds herself still haunted by memories. Meanwhile, Nao chases her aspirations for the stage head-on, refusing to back down or let obstacles block her way. After the lives of these two theatre geeks cross, their aspirations will either form their friendship or fuel their rivalry. When romance sparks, which will prevail in the love... or the stage?
author: Syu Yasaka
